1.title: Is Porn Naked and Unashamed?
1.plot: It brings in more money than professional baseball and football combined. Many consider it harmless entertainment. Others aren't so sure. Hope Undimmed brings together an incredible panel to answer the question, "Is Pornography Naked and Unashamed?" - A former producer credited with taking over 2 million photographs and shooting thousands of hours of video. - A former star boasting 30 videos, numerous photographs and her own website. - A consumer of pornography and his wife discuss their experience. - A medical professional who has testified before the United states ...

2.title: Can a Woman Have Sex Like a Man?
2.plot: The HBO series Sex and the City launched a cultural revolution with its promise of sexual freedom. Many celebrate its enduring impact on American culture. Others aren't so sure. Hope Undimmed brings together an incredible panel to answer the question, "Can a woman have sex like a man?" A best selling author chronicles her experience counseling students at one of America's leading universities. A physician specializing in women's health and reproduction. A former manager of four abortion clinics provides a look inside the abortion industry. A couple recounts their ...

3.title: The Human Person: Beyond the Limits of Science?
3.plot: One hundred billion neurons, stretching one million miles, processing 38 thousand trillion bits of information per second. Many believe that science has solved the riddle of the human person. Others aren't so sure. Hope Undimmed brings together an incredible panel to look at the human person beyond the limits of science.

4.title: Why Can't a Woman Be More Like a Man?
4.plot: Genetically men and women are 99 percent identical, yet that one percent drives the attraction between the sexes and causes a great deal of misunderstanding. Hope Undimmed brings together an incredible panel and examines that one percent that causes all the confusion.

5.title: Boy Meets Girl: Agony or Ecstasy?
5.plot: The Promise of Paradise. The Possibility of Despair. In a world where 40 percent of marriages end in divorce many question if love has come to an end. Others see love as life itself. Hope Undimmed brings together an incredible panel to answer the question, "When boy meets girl is it agony or ecstasy?"

6.title: Where Is Our World Heading?
6.plot: A Glimpse into the Future. The Challenge for a New Generation. Technological advancement brings the promise of a brighter future. Many have hopes for a period of peace and prosperity. Others aren't so sure. Hope Undimmed brings together an incredible panel to answer the question, "Where is our world heading?"

7.title: What Brings Happiness?
7.plot: Simple answers to a future filled with hope. In an uncertain world many question the possibility of true happiness. Others believe that personal happiness is always within their grasp. Hope Undimmed brings together an incredible panel to answer the question, "What brings happiness?"

locations: Houston, Texas, USA::(University of St. Thomas)
imdb.title: Hope Undimmed
